mapper.select: select emotion, u.name userName, delivery, price, prodInfo, prodName, prodNo from product p, users u where p.userNo = u.userNo and p.prodno = #{no}
select prodImgNo, prodImgSrc, prodImgName, ProdNo from prodImg where prodno = #{no}
select cmtNo, prodNo, c.userNo userNo, cmtContent, regDate, groupNo, cmtSeq, depth, name from comments c, users u where u.userNo = c.userNo and prodNo = #{no} order by groupNo asc

select pd.prodNo prodNo, pd.userNo userNo, pd.prodName prodName, pd.emotion emotion, pd.price price, pd.delivery delivery, pd.prodinfo prodinfo, pd.regDate regDate, pi.prodImgNo prodImgNo, pi.prodImgSrc prodImgSrc, pi.prodImgName prodImgName, pcc.cmtCnt cmtCnt, pdc.diaryCnt diaryCnt, ppc.pickCnt pickCnt from product pd,
(select prodImgNo, prodImgSrc, prodImgName, prodNo from prodImg where prodimgNo in (select min(prodimgNo) from prodImg group by prodNo) )pi,
(select count(cmtNo) cmtCnt, p.prodNo prodNo from comments c, product p where c.prodNo = p.prodNo group by p.prodNo) pcc,
(select count(diaryNo) diaryCnt, p.prodNo prodNo from proddiary pd, product p where p.prodNo = pd.prodNo group by p.prodNo) pdc,
(select count(pickNo) pickCnt, pdct.prodNo from pick pk, product pdct where pk.prodNo = pdct.prodno group by pdct.prodNo) ppc
where pd.prodNo = pi.prodNo and pd.prodNo = pcc.prodNo(+) and pd.prodNo = pdc.prodNo(+) and pd.prodNo = ppc.prodNo(+)
select count(diaryNo) diaryCnt, p.prodNo prodNo from proddiary pd, product p where p.prodNo = pd.prodNo group by p.prodNo
select count(cmtNo) cmtCnt, p.prodNo prodNo from comments c, product p where c.prodNo = p.prodNo group by p.prodNo
